nodes.text: Vaathkree trade language was an obscure, possibly extinct language that was one of C-3PO's six million forms of communication. He suggested its use as a form of code to use to talk to Wedge Antilles at the Battle of Filve, before Han Solo pointed out that Wedge could not speak Vaathkree trade language.
Upon nearing Demonsgate, the FarStar picked up a distress signal in the Vaathkree trade language.
